tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audit_log (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
CREATE TABLE audit_logs (id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, action VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE user_roles (role_id INT PRIMARY KEY, role_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE access_logs (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, action VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE audits (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  action TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  details JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  username TEXT,
  email TEXT,
  phone TEXT,
  role TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE roles (
  role_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  role_name TEXT,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE permissions (
  permission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  permission_name TEXT,
  description TEXT
)
